description: Master the art of mid-air precision by stomping on flying Koopa Paratroopas to stay aloft.
rationale: This game focuses on verticality and timing, challenging players to maintain momentum in a gravity-based environment. It serves as a specialized training ground for reinforcement learning agents to learn aerial trajectory prediction and sequential jumping logic.
details: The game features a player character at the bottom of the screen and a series of Paratroopas (flying turtles) descending from the top in various sinusoidal patterns. The player must jump and collide with the top of a Paratroopa to bounce higher. If the player misses and falls to the bottom of the screen, the game ends. If the player hits the side or bottom of a Paratroopa, they lose a life. The goal is to survive as long as possible while accumulating points for each successful consecutive stomp.
how_to_play: Use the Left and Right Arrow keys to move horizontally. Use the Spacebar to initiate the first jump from the ground. Score increases by 100 points for each enemy stomped. A combo multiplier (x1, x2, x4, etc.) is applied for every consecutive stomp performed without touching the ground. Avoid falling off the bottom edge.
